caption.p: (a) FDM of experimental APT data of Al bi-crystal with crystallographic patterns indexed. (b) Al-density map of reconstruction, â‰ˆ 1.2 nm thick, through the centre of the reconstruction on the YZ-plane. (c) Stereographic projection representation of the two grains, showing low index poles and zone-lines, colored corresponding to the IPF-Z. (d) The orientation cells and Bunge-Euler notation within the APT detector frame.
